page.title: 12WETHERBY 10YR OLD'S SATURDAY
page.content: {SATURDAY} {10.00-10.30}Mum gets me up, have breakfast, get dressed. {10.45-11.05}I walk dogs with Dad. Mum goes shopping, Gerard gets up. {11.10-12.00}Play on bike, Dad collects wood from wood-yard. Help unload wood. {12.00-2.30}Have dinner, then wash-up, Neil and I go swimming, Gerard goes fishing. {3.45-5.00}Back from swimming, have a 'cuppa', watch wrestling on the television. Gerard comes back. (cuppa = cup of tea). {5.00-6.30}Tea-time, Mum washes up. {6.30-9.45}Dad and Gerard go shooting (pigeon). I go on bike, later watch television. I go to bed and read. Dad and Gerard come back. {10.00-11.30}Mum & Dad go to the pub, Neil and Gerard go to bed, I go to sleep. Mum & Dad return and go to bed.
